sense.def: Pathological Condition of shang sun 傷損 , injury, inflicted by blunt force that does not break the skin but injures organs in the body’s interior. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 36: 壓迮墜墮內損候：此 為人卒被重物壓迮，或從高墜下，致吐、下血，此傷五內故也 , “The signs of internal injury resulting from pressure and falls: This results when a person is suddenly exposed to heavy pressure, or when he falls from somewhere high, and leads to blood spitting and blood downpour. These are the reasons for injuries to the five internal [organs]”.
